roleset.name: need, required, necessary
roleset.note: NEED-V NOTES: Based on big corpus. Member of Vncls require-103, want-32.1-1-1. (from need.01-v)
NEED-N NOTES: Updated by Julia. Member of Vncls order-60, require-103, want-32.1-1-1. (from need.01-n)
NEEDED-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1, need-v.01. Corresponds to Vncls require-103, want-32.1-1-1. (from needed.01-j)

example.name: need an NP
example.text: I need a flight to Seattle leaving from Baltimore making a stop inMinneapolis.
example.arg: a flight to Seattle leaving from Baltimore making a stop in Minneapolis

example.name: need an infinitive
example.text: I-1 need *trace*-1 to have dinner served *trace*

example.name: need both an NP and an S
example.text: Prosecutors-1 need court permission *trace*-1 to obtain the tax returns of an individual or a business.
example.arg: *trace* to obtain the tax returns of an individual or a business.

example.name: need an S
example.text: I need you to pay attention to the frames files!
example.arg: you to pay attention to the frames files

example.name: autogen2
example.text: the need to avoid those cuts

example.name: with MNR
example.text: an urgent need to find a way to prevent pollution of their coastal waters
example.arg: to find a way to prevent pollution of their coastal waters

example.name: CAU: because nobody needs an earthquake
example.text: Not everyone is convinced the state must raise new revenue to meet its earthquake needs

example.name: patient + proposition = arg1
example.text: his need for them to play better

example.name: arg1
example.text: Thus , it is just and needed for the US to impose such sanctions on Iran .
example.arg: for the US to impose such sanctions on Iran
